original: Majjhima Nikāya 55
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Jīvakasutta
analyzed: jīvaka sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane

original: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu jīvakaḥ komārabhaccaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu jīvakaḥ komārabhaccaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante:
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante

original: ‘samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ uddissa pāṇaṁ ārabhanti, taṁ samaṇo gotamo jānaṁ uddissakataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjati paṭiccakamman’ti.
analyzed: samaṇam gotamam uddissa pāṇam ārabhanti tam samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ jānam uddissa katam masam paribhuñjati paṭiccakammanti

original: Ye te, bhante, evamāhaṁsu: ‘samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ uddissa pāṇaṁ ārabhanti, taṁ samaṇo gotamo
analyzed: ye te bhante evam āhasu samaṇam gotamam uddissa pāṇam ārabhanti tam samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ

original: jānaṁ uddissakataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjati paṭiccakamman’ti, kacci te, bhante, bhagavato
analyzed: jānam uddissa katam masam paribhuñjati paṭiccakammanti kacci te bhante bhagavato

original: vuttavādino, na ca bhagavantaṁ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti, dhammassa cānudhammaṁ byākaronti,
analyzed: vutta vādinaḥ na ca bhagavantam abhūtena abbhācikkhanti dhammassa ca anudhammam byākaronti

original: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgacchatī”ti?
analyzed: na ca koci sahadhammikaḥ vāda anuvādaḥ gārayham ṭhānam āgacchati iti

original: “Ye te, jīvaka, evamāhaṁsu: ‘samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ uddissa pāṇaṁ ārabhanti, taṁ samaṇo
analyzed: ye te jīvakaḥ samaṇam gotamam uddissa pāṇam ārabhanti tam samaṇaḥ

original: gotamo jānaṁ uddissakataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjati paṭiccakamman’ti na me te vuttavādino,
analyzed: gotamaḥ jānam uddissa katam masam paribhuñjati na me te vutta vādinaḥ

original: abbhācikkhanti ca maṁ te asatā abhūtena.
analyzed: abbhācikkhanti ca mamam te asatā abhūtena

original: Tīhi kho ahaṁ, jīvaka, ṭhānehi maṁsaṁ aparibhoganti vadāmi.
analyzed: tīhi kho aha jīvaka ṭhānehi vadāmi

original: Diṭṭhaṁ, sutaṁ, parisaṅkitaṁ—
analyzed: diṭṭha suta parisaṅkita

original: imehi kho ahaṁ, jīvaka, tīhi ṭhānehi maṁsaṁ aparibhoganti vadāmi.
analyzed: imehi kho aha jīvaka tīhi ṭhānehi vadāmi

original: Tīhi kho ahaṁ, jīvaka, ṭhānehi maṁsaṁ paribhoganti vadāmi.
analyzed: tīhi kho aha jīvaka ṭhānehi vadāmi

original: Adiṭṭhaṁ, asutaṁ, aparisaṅkitaṁ—
analyzed: a diṭṭha a suta a parisaṅkita

original: imehi kho ahaṁ, jīvaka, tīhi ṭhānehi maṁsaṁ paribhoganti vadāmi.
analyzed: imehi kho aha jīvaka tīhi ṭhānehi masam vadāmi

original: Idha, jīvaka, bhikkhu aññataraṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: idha jīvaka bhikkhu aññataram gāmam vā nigamam vā upanissāya viharati

original: So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ,
analyzed: saḥ mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam viharati tathā dutiya tathā tatiya

original: tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena
analyzed: tathā catutthaḥ iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam mettā sahagatena

original: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati

original: Tamenaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimanteti.
analyzed: tam enam gahapati vā gahapati puttaḥ vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimanteti

original: Ākaṅkhamānova, jīvaka, bhikkhu adhivāseti.
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānaḥ iva jīvaka bhikkhu adhivāseti

original: So tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassa
analyzed: saḥ tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena tassa

original: gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamati; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdati.
analyzed: gahapatissa vā gahapati puttassa vā nivesanam tena upasaṅkamati upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdati

original: Tamenaṁ so gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena parivisati.
analyzed: tam enam saḥ gahapatiḥ vā gahapati putto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena parivisati

original: Tassa na evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: tassa na evam hoti

original: ‘sādhu vata māyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyyāti.
analyzed: sādhu vata mā ayam gahapati vā gahapati putto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyya ati

original: Aho vata māyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā āyatimpi evarūpena paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyyā’ti—
analyzed: aho vata mā ayam gahapati vā gahapati putto vā evarūpena paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyya ati

original: evampissa na hoti.
analyzed: evam pi ssa na hoti

original: So taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ agathito amucchito anajjhopanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati.
analyzed: saḥ tam piṇḍapātam a gathitaḥ a mucchitaḥ an ajjhopannaḥ ādīnava dassāvī nissaraṇa paññaḥ paribhuñjati

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, jīvaka,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi jīvaka

original: api nu so bhikkhu tasmiṁ samaye attabyābādhāya vā ceteti, parabyābādhāya vā ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāya vā cetetī”ti?
analyzed: api nu saḥ bhikkhu tasmin samaye atta byābādhāya vā ceteti para byābādhāya vā ceteti ubhaya byābādhāya vā ceteti iti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Nanu so, jīvaka, bhikkhu tasmiṁ samaye anavajjaṁyeva āhāraṁ āhāretī”ti?
analyzed: nanu saḥ jīvaka bhikkhu tasmin samaye anavajjayā iva āhāram āhāreti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante:
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante

original: ‘brahmā mettāvihārī’ti.
analyzed: brahmā mettāvihārī iti

original: Taṁ me idaṁ, bhante, bhagavā sakkhidiṭṭho;
analyzed: tam me bhante bhagavā sakkhidiṭṭhaḥ

original: bhagavā hi, bhante, mettāvihārī”ti.
analyzed: bhagavā hi bhante mettā vihārī iti

original: “Yena kho, jīvaka, rāgena yena dosena yena mohena byāpādavā assa so rāgo so doso so moho tathāgatassa pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo.
analyzed: yena kho jīvaka rāgena yena dosena yena mohena byāpāda vā assa saḥ rāgaḥ saḥ dosaḥ saḥ mohaḥ tathāgatassa pahīnaḥ ucchinna mūlo tālā vatthukataḥ anabhāvaṅkataḥ āyatim an uppāda dhammo

original: Sace kho te, jīvaka, idaṁ sandhāya bhāsitaṁ anujānāmi te etan”ti.
analyzed: sace khalu te jīvakaḥ idam sandhāya bhāsitam anujānāmi te etat iti

original: “Etadeva kho pana me, bhante, sandhāya bhāsitaṁ”.
analyzed: etat eva kho pana me bhante sandhāya bhāsita

original: “Idha, jīvaka, bhikkhu aññataraṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: idha jīvaka bhikkhu aññataram gāmam vā nigamam vā upanissāya viharati

original: So karuṇāsahagatena cetasā …pe…
analyzed: saḥ karuṇā sahagatena cetasā pe

original: muditāsahagatena cetasā …pe…
analyzed: muditā sahagatena cetasā pe

original: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati tathā dutiya tathā tatiya tathā catuttha

original: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati.
analyzed: iti uddham adhas tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantam lokam upekkhā sahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā viharati

original: Tamenaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimanteti.
analyzed: tam enam gahapati vā gahapati puttaḥ vā upasaṅkamitvā svātanāya bhattena nimanteti

original: Ākaṅkhamānova, jīvaka, bhikkhu adhivāseti.
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānaḥ iva jīvaka bhikkhu adhivāseti

original: So tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamati; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdati.
analyzed: so tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena gahapatissa vā gahapati puttassa vā nivesanam tena upasaṅkamati upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdati

original: Tamenaṁ so gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena parivisati.
analyzed: tam enam saḥ gahapatiḥ vā gahapati putto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena parivisati

original: Tassa na evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: tassa na evam hoti

original: ‘sādhu vata māyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyyāti.
analyzed: sādhu vata mā ayam gahapati vā gahapati putto vā paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyya ati

original: Aho vata māyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā āyatimpi evarūpena paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyyā’ti—
analyzed: aho vata mā ayam gahapati vā gahapati putto vā evarūpena paṇītena piṇḍapātena pariviseyya ati

original: evampissa na hoti.
analyzed: evam pi ssa na hoti

original: So taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ agathito amucchito anajjhopanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati.
analyzed: saḥ tam piṇḍapātam a gathitaḥ a mucchitaḥ an ajjhopannaḥ ādīnava dassāvī nissaraṇa paññaḥ paribhuñjati

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, jīvaka,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi jīvaka

original: api nu so bhikkhu tasmiṁ samaye attabyābādhāya vā ceteti, parabyābādhāya vā ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāya vā cetetī”ti?
analyzed: api nu saḥ bhikkhu tasmin samaye atta byābādhāya vā ceteti para byābādhāya vā ceteti ubhaya byābādhāya vā ceteti iti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Nanu so, jīvaka, bhikkhu tasmiṁ samaye anavajjaṁyeva āhāraṁ āhāretī”ti?
analyzed: nanu saḥ jīvaka bhikkhu tasmin samaye anavajjayā iva āhāram āhāreti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante:
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante

original: ‘brahmā upekkhāvihārī’ti.
analyzed: brahmā upekkhā vihārī iti

original: Taṁ me idaṁ, bhante, bhagavā sakkhidiṭṭho;
analyzed: tam me bhante bhagavā sakkhidiṭṭhaḥ

original: bhagavā hi, bhante, upekkhāvihārī”ti.
analyzed: bhagavā hi bhante upekkhā vihārī iti

original: “Yena kho, jīvaka, rāgena yena dosena yena mohena vihesavā assa arativā assa paṭighavā
analyzed: yena kho jīvaka rāgena yena dosena yena mohena vihesavā assa a rativā assa paṭighavā

original: assa so rāgo so doso so moho tathāgatassa pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato
analyzed: assa saḥ rāgaḥ saḥ dosaḥ saḥ moho tathāgatassa pahīnaḥ ucchinna mūlo tālā vatthukataḥ an abhāvaṅkataḥ

original: āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo.
analyzed: āyatim an uppāda dhammaḥ

original: Sace kho te, jīvaka, idaṁ sandhāya bhāsitaṁ, anujānāmi te etan”ti.
analyzed: sace khalu te jīvakaḥ idam sandhāya bhāsita anujānāmi te etat ti

original: “Etadeva kho pana me, bhante, sandhāya bhāsitaṁ”.
analyzed: etat eva kho pana me bhante sandhāya bhāsita

original: “Yo kho, jīvaka, tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā uddissa pāṇaṁ ārabhati so pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṁ apuññaṁ pasavati.
analyzed: yaḥ kho jīvaka tathāgatam vā tathāgata sāvakam vā uddissa pāṇam ārabhati saḥ pañcahi ṭhānehi bahum apuññam pasavati

original: Yampi so, gahapati, evamāha:
analyzed: saḥ gahapati evam āha

original: ‘gacchatha, amukaṁ nāma pāṇaṁ ānethā’ti, iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena bahuṁ apuññaṁ pasavati.
analyzed: gacchatha amukam nāma pāṇam ānetha ati iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena bahum apuññam pasavati

original: Yampi so pāṇo galappaveṭhakena ānīyamāno dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti, iminā dutiyena ṭhānena bahuṁ apuññaṁ pasavati.
analyzed: yam pi saḥ pāṇaḥ galappaveṭhakena ānīyamānaḥ dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti iminā dutiyena ṭhānena bahum apuññam pasavati

original: Yampi so evamāha:
analyzed: saḥ evam āha

original: ‘gacchatha imaṁ pāṇaṁ ārabhathā’ti, iminā tatiyena ṭhānena bahuṁ apuññaṁ pasavati.
analyzed: gacchatha imam pāṇam ārabhatha ati iminā tatiyena ṭhānena bahum apuññam pasavati

original: Yampi so pāṇo ārabhiyamāno dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti, iminā catutthena ṭhānena bahuṁ apuññaṁ pasavati.
analyzed: yam pi saḥ pāṇaḥ ārabhiyamānaḥ dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti iminā catutthena ṭhānena bahum apuññam pasavati

original: Yampi so tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā akappiyena āsādeti, iminā pañcamena ṭhānena bahuṁ apuññaṁ pasavati.
analyzed: yam pi saḥ tathāgatam vā tathāgata sāvakam vā akappiyena āsādeti iminā pañcamena ṭhānena bahum apuññam pasavati

original: Yo kho, jīvaka, tathāgataṁ vā tathāgatasāvakaṁ vā uddissa pāṇaṁ ārabhati so imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṁ apuññaṁ pasavatī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ kho jīvaka tathāgatam vā tathāgata sāvakam vā uddissa pāṇam ārabhati saḥ imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi bahum apuññam pasavati iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte jīvakaḥ komārabhaccaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “acchariyaṁ, bhante, abbhutaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: acchariya bhante abbhuta bhante

original: Kappiyaṁ vata, bhante, bhikkhū āhāraṁ āhārenti;
analyzed: kappiyam vata bhante bhikkhū āhāram āhārenti

original: anavajjaṁ vata, bhante, bhikkhū āhāraṁ āhārenti.
analyzed: anavajjam vata bhante bhikkhū āhāram āhārenti

original: Abhikkantaṁ, bhante, abhikkantaṁ, bhante …pe…
analyzed: abhikkanta bhante abhikkanta bhante pe

original: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇa upetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Jīvakasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ pañcamaṁ.
analyzed: jīvaka suttam niṭṭhitam pañcama
